SELECT * FROM COM_MSG WHERE RECEIVED_USER_ID = #{userId} AND IS_READ = 0 AND (MSG_TIME IS NULL OR MSG_TIME <= #{currentTime}) GROUP BY UUID HAVING MAX(MSG_TIME) ORDER BY MSG_TIME DESC
SELECT * FROM COM_MSG WHERE RECEIVED_USER_ID = #{userId} AND IS_READ = 0 AND LEFT(MSG_TIME, 10) = curdate() AND MSG_TIME > #{currentTime} ORDER BY MSG_TIME DESC

SELECT MSG_ID,TITLE,CONTENT, RELATION_ID, CASE WHEN MSG_TIME IS NOT NULL AND MSG_TIME != '' THEN MSG_TIME ELSE CREATE_TIME END AS MSG_TIME FROM COM_MSG WHERE RECEIVED_USER_ID = #{userId} AND TYPE = '5' AND (MSG_TIME IS NULL OR MSG_TIME <= now()) GROUP BY UUID HAVING MAX(MSG_TIME) ORDER BY MSG_TIME DESC LIMIT #{num}
